                                        StudySpace ss)
        print table of initial invites, eligible invitees for a survey, by message sequence (& therefore irb ID)
        Parameters:
        surveyId - Survey Id whose invitees are to be listed.
        isReminder - Is the message a reminder or not.
        Returns:
        String HTML format of the invitees tables separated based on the message sequence type

      • renderInviteTable

        public java.lang.String renderInviteTable(java.lang.String surveyId,
                                 StudySpace ss)
        print table of all sendable invitees, all invitees, by message sequence (& therefore irb ID)
        Parameters:
        surveyId - Survey Id for which all invitees have to listed.
        StudySpace - StudySpace whose list of invitees have to be displayed.
        Returns:
        String HTML table format of all the invitees under the given survey id.
